participant_1.background:
I am not able to afford a house because of my financial situation.
i also like ice cream.
i am single and go on dates regularly.

i have 4 dogs.

participant_2.background:
I have a habit of biting my nails when I'm stressed.
I'm leaving the city to live closer to my family.
i really wanted to be an actor.
i love my impala.
I live in the suburbs because it is a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends.

content.text: Hi there! Doing well. How are you?
Pretty good, thanks! I'm going to be leaving the city soon to live closer to my family. I'm excited to be moving but I'm also nervous about the change.

That's exciting! I live in the suburbs and I love it here. It's a quiet place where I can relax and enjoy my family and friends. I have a habit of biting my nails when I'm stressed, so moving to a quieter place will hopefully help me break that habit.

That's a good idea! I'm not sure what I'm going to do to help with my stress. I run my own cleaning company and I love spending time with my family, but I'm not sure if that will be enough to keep me busy.
Maybe you could try taking up a new hobby? I really wanted to be an actor when I was younger, but I never had the time to pursue it. Now that I'm older, I'm thinking about taking some acting classes.
That's a great idea! I've always wanted to try acting too. Maybe we could take classes together!
That would be fun! I'd love to have someone to practice with.
Great! We can start looking for classes soon.
Sounds good! I'm excited to start this new chapter in my life.
Me too! I'm sure it's going to be great.
